entries.title: Car buyers love EVs but hate the prices. That’s bad for green-energy hopes.
entries.description: New federal tax credits up to $7,500 for electric vehicles built in North America could help juice demand. But the administration is still working out the fine print.

entries.title: After layoffs, Meta, tech companies face uphill battle to boost diversity
entries.description: Meta and other technology companies long have struggled to recruit a diverse workforce. The recent spate of cuts by Silicon Valley companies has hit those efforts hard.
